title: Why Has It Taken 40 Years To Build A Tennessee Nuclear Power Plant?
teaser: Associated Press reporter Ray Henry says the Watts Bar Nuclear Plant serves as a cautionary tale for America's nuclear power industry.
contentencoded:
A new nuclear power plant is nearing completion in Spring City, Tennessee, and it’s expected to be up and running byÂ late summer.

It has taken about 40 years to complete the project.

Associated Press reporter Ray Henry tells Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti that the Watts Bar plant serves as a cautionary tale for America’s nuclear power industry.
